messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Detective's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a pack of [REDACTED] have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.
